revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: " (Col. i):;Ischyrion, son of Sarapion, grandson of Ischyrion, mother Soumenis;;Phaesis, with the nick-name Kerset, his brother;;-----;Aphrodas, son of Touanis, metropolite, mother Soumenis;;Pa . . . , son of Ischyrion, grandson of Stephanos, mother Sarapous;;Paesis, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Artemas, mother Sambathion;;-----;Ischyrion, son of Kephalas, grandson of Meiouris, mother Thermouthis;;Kephalas, his son, mother Sarapous;;-----;Pnepheros, son of Deios, grandson of Isidoros;;-----;Chaireas, from Kaine, linen-weaver;;Bassos, his brother, likewise;;-----;Ischyrion, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Mystharion, mother Thermouthis;;Ischyrion, his son, mother Taptollis, metropolite;;Isidoros, another;;Patas, another;;Heras, another;;-----;Kloris, son of Phasis, grandson of Kastor, mother Heraklous;;Neseus, his son, metropolite;;-----;Kollouthos, son of Didymos, grandson of Didymos;;-----;Akiaris, mender;;-----;Malis, son of Malis, grandson of Heraklas, mother Thermouthis;;-----;Pnepheros, son of . . ., grandson of . . ., mother . . .;;-----;Akiaris, [ ];;. . .;;(col. ii);Ischyrion, son of Sarapion, grandson of Didymos, mother Isis nick-named Tkaria;;Akiaris, son of Maron, gardener;;-----;Apynchis, son of Papontos, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thaubas;;-----;Apynchis, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Komon, mother Demos;;-----;Phaesis, son of Touamis, mother Apollomous;;Kallas, his brother with the same mother, nick-named Phillamon;;Sansneus, another brother nick-named Anabok;;-----;Ischyrion, son of Heras, grandson of Heras, mother Heras;;Apynchis, his brother with the same mother;;Phasis, another brother with the same mother;;Pnepheros, son of Ischyrion, mother Achnes;;Penoupis, his brother with the same mother;;Heras, son of Apynchis, mother Taseaipis;;-----;Penneis, donkey-driver from the Oxyrhynchite nome;;Poualis, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Pholemis, mother Soumeis, nick-named Pouro;;-----;Hatres, son of Heraklas, grandson of Heron, mother Ammonia;;Peteeus, his brother with the same mother;;-----;Syros, son of Sambathion, grandson of Syros, mother Herais, gardener;;Ischyrion, his son, mother Akousarion;;-----;Tourbon, son of Heras, grandson of Heras, mother . .eus;;. . .a, nicknamed Sarapion, his son, mother Sambathion;(2nd hd.) . . ., nick-named Hilario;;-----;(1st hd.) Antonius, son of Maron;;Sansneus, his son, mother Sarapias;;-----;(col. III);Sokras, fatherless, mother Taphaeis;;Heraklas, his brother;;-----;Hatres, son of Sambas, grandson of Ischyrion, mother Sambous, nick-named Nana;;Deios, son of Ploution, mother Didyme;;-----;Ischyrion, son of Atha, grandson of Maron, nick-named Gonkos, mother Thermouthis;;Deios, his brother, nick-named Maxima;;-----;Ischyrion, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Sokrates, nick-named Os;;-----;Ischyrion, son of Hermeias, grandson of Ischyrion, mother Sambous, nick-named Stroma;;-----;Heraklas, son of Rufus, mother Didis, under-age;;Aphrodas from Arsinoe;;Ischyrion, his sin;;Onnophris, another (son);;-----;Ischyrion, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Sambas, mother Ischyriaine, nick-named Asoubos;;Ischyrion, his son;;Ischyrion, son of Neseus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Demos, nick-named Pkenna;;-----;Hatres, son of Hermeias, nick-named Kalaphelt, linen-weaver;;-----;Heron, son of Deios, grandson of Damas, mother Seeietos, nick-named Ourous;;-----;Neseus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Maron, mother Diodora, greengrocer, nick-named Thienpee;;-----;Sambathion, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Dioskoros, mother Demos;;-----;Hatres, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Herakles, mother Charis;;-----;Piolis, son of Hatres, mender;;-----;Tou. . ., grandson of Pnepheros, mother ...rios;;(col. iv [38]);(in left margin: actuarius phylakeiou) Kronion, son of Pouaris alias Kynaros, nick-named Samanytis;;Ischyras, son of Ischyras, nick-named Korkodilos;;-----;Samaleis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Piolis, mother Taphaseis;;-----;Phanias, son of Phimenis, grandson of
